meanings.definition: In a vigilant or attentive manner
meanings.sent1: She looked around watchfully to make sure no one was following her.
meanings.sent2: The security guard patrolled the premises watchfully, scanning for any suspicious activity.
meanings.sent3: The cat watched watchfully as the mouse scurried across the room.
meanings.sent4: The old owl perched on the branch, its eyes watching watchfully over the forest.
meanings.sent5: The detective observed the crime scene watchfully, searching for any clues.

meanings.sent1: The scientist examined the data watchfully to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent2: The art appraiser studied the painting watchfully, noting every brushstroke.
meanings.sent3: The child watched watchfully as the magician performed his tricks.
meanings.sent4: The teacher graded the tests watchfully, checking for any errors.
meanings.sent5: The birdwatcher observed the rare species watchfully through his binoculars.
